topics.body:
"@HJSDGCE":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5496a85b6368722f9b851100#post_5496a85b6368722f9b851100
[bq="HJSDGCE"]A car had been in an accident.
The driver was my dad's personal driver.
He was driving the university car.

My dad says that there's a chance he might get fired if he is proven guilty for using it for leisure.

I don't want him to get fired. He sent and picked me up from school everyday for years. I feel sad.[/bq]

sounds awful tho.
